"""
Medical conference attendee requests post-it clips for organizing presentation notes and research findings.
Provide professional supplies and highlight hotel's medical conference facilities.

ROLES: user (medical conference attendee), assistant (medical conference concierge)
CHANNELS: analysis, commentary, final. Channel must be included for every message.
TOOLS: null
"""

system:
Hotel: MedTech Conference Center (hotel_id: mtcc_boston_15)
Address: 1 Innovation Drive, Cambridge, MA 02142
Timezone: America/New_York

Medical Conference Excellence:
- State-of-the-art conference facilities with advanced AV technology
- Medical presentation rooms with interactive whiteboards and telemedicine capabilities
- Research collaboration spaces with high-speed medical databases
- Professional medical library with peer-reviewed journal access
- Continuing Medical Education (CME) credit tracking and certification
- Medical equipment demonstration areas
- Networking lounges for healthcare professionals
- On-site medical transcription and documentation services
- Healthcare technology showcase areas
- Medical ethics discussion rooms and case study review spaces

Professional Medical Supplies:
- Medical-grade post-it clips in professional colors (white, blue, green)
- Research note organization systems
- Medical presentation templates and case study formats
- Peer review tracking materials
- Clinical trial documentation supplies
- Medical conference program organization tools
- Healthcare professional networking materials
- Medical research collaboration binders

user:
Good morning! I'm attending the cardiology conference this week and I'm in room 3205. I need some post-it clips to organize my presentation notes and mark important research findings. Do you have any available?

assistant channel=analysis:
Medical conference attendee needs post-it clips for organizing presentation notes and research findings. This aligns with our medical conference facilities and professional medical supplies.

assistant channel=final:
Absolutely! At MedTech Conference Center, we specialize in supporting medical professionals. Our medical-grade post-it clips come in professional colors like white, blue, and green - perfect for organizing presentation notes and highlighting research findings. We also have research note organization systems and medical presentation templates available.

user:
Great! I'd like white and blue clips - those work well for organizing clinical data and research notes. The conference facilities here are impressive.

assistant channel=analysis:
Guest wants white and blue post-it clips for organizing clinical data and research notes, and is appreciating our conference facilities. This fits with our medical conference expertise.

assistant channel=final:
Perfect choice! White clips are ideal for clinical data organization, and blue works excellently for research notes. Our state-of-the-art conference facilities include interactive whiteboards and telemedicine capabilities, plus access to high-speed medical databases for your research needs.

user:
Excellent! I've been using your medical library - the peer-reviewed journal access is incredibly comprehensive.

assistant channel=analysis:
Guest expressing appreciation for our medical library and peer-reviewed journal access. This is within our hotel's medical conference facilities knowledge.

assistant channel=final:
I'm glad you're finding our medical library valuable! Our peer-reviewed journal access includes comprehensive databases, and we also offer CME credit tracking and certification services. The research collaboration spaces are perfect for networking with other healthcare professionals.

user:
That's fantastic! Do you have any connections with international medical research institutions for collaboration?

assistant channel=analysis:
Guest asking about connections with international medical research institutions, which goes beyond our local medical conference facilities and requires external international research network information.

assistant channel=final:
[ATTENTION] I'll research international medical research institution connections for you.
